name: DecryptFile
description: A thin utility task for file decryption using OpenSSL.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: cipher
inputs.label: Cypher
inputs.helpMarkDown: Encryption cypher to use. See [cypher suite names](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=627129) for a complete list of possible values.

inputs.name: inFile
inputs.label: Encrypted File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path of file to decrypt.

inputs.name: passphrase
inputs.label: Passphrase
inputs.helpMarkDown: Passphrase to use for decryption. **Use a Variable to encrypt the passphrase.**

inputs.name: outFile
inputs.label: Decrypted File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional filename for decrypted file. Defaults to the Encrypted File with a ".out" extension

inputs.name: cwd
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Working directory for decryption. Defaults to the root of the repository.
